title: Help... account is hacked, and my email has been changed!!!!
body: I am the orginal owner of this account, but recently I decided to try to log in to play league and with my username and password still the same, I was able to log in. However, when going in I would always be met with the "Reconnect" page and I also noticed that many of my friends had been removed. I tried changing my email and thats when I noticed it went to theirs.,. Please help!!!

replies.body: That's definitely no good! Reach out to our account team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) when you get the chance by picking the top option "I need help recovering my account". After you verify yourself as the original creator with those questions, the agents should be able to get everything straightened out ^_^
